title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men form a bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two hitmen, a boxer, the wife of a gangster, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary life story.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: The fate of Middle-earth is at stake as the final battle against Sauron's forces takes place. The last battle for survival begins.

title: Inception
description: A thief who specializes in stealing corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is hired to perform one final job: to plant an idea into the mind of a target.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac and frustrated man forms a secret club with a charismatic soap salesman, which grows into something much bigger and more dangerous than he ever imagined.

title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers that the reality he knows is a simulation created by intelligent machines to subjugate humanity, and he joins a group of rebels to fight for freedom.

title: The Empire Strikes Back
description: The Rebel Alliance faces its greatest challenge when the Galactic Empire launches a full-scale attack on their secret base. Luke Skywalker embarks on a journey to train with Jedi Master Yoda, while Darth Vader hunts the heroes.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole near Saturn in search of a new home for humanity, while time on Earth moves rapidly due to a global catastrophe.

title: The Green Mile
description: A prison officer discovers that one of the death row inmates has extraordinary healing powers. As the story unfolds, profound lessons about life, death, and redemption emerge.

title: Gladiator
description: A Roman general is betrayed and condemned to slavery. Seeking revenge, he becomes a gladiator and fights in the arena, aiming to overthrow the corrupt emperor who destroyed his life.

title: The Departed
description: In the city of Boston, the police and the mafia are involved in a dangerous game of espionage and betrayal. Two undercover men must stay one step ahead while their identities are at risk.

title: The Prestige
description: Two rival magicians embark on an obsessive competition to create the perfect magic trick, while their envy and rivalry lead them down a dangerous path involving secrets, deception, and sacrifices.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion, destined to be king, flees after his father's death. Years later, he returns to claim his place as the leader of the kingdom, facing his evil uncle Scar in an epic showdown.

title: The Usual Suspects
description: Five criminals are interrogated by the police about a failed robbery, but what develops is a story full of deception, unexpected twists, and a mysterious villain known as Keyser Söze.

title: Schindler's List
description: The true story of Oskar Schindler, a German businessman who saved over a thousand Jews during the Holocaust by employing them in his factory, despite the extreme conditions and the risks he faced.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI agent seeks the help of an imprisoned serial killer, Hannibal Lecter, to capture another serial killer who is on the loose. A tense mental interaction leads to a deadly psychological game.

title: The Shining
description: A writer and his family move to an isolated hotel in the mountains, where he seeks inspiration for his next book. Soon, the solitude and mysterious events at the hotel unleash a supernatural force that threatens their lives.

title: Se7en
description: Two detectives investigate a series of gruesome murders, where each crime represents one of the seven deadly sins. As they close in on the culprit, they uncover a chilling twist.

title: Saving Private Ryan
description: During World War II, a group of soldiers embarks on a dangerous mission to save a paratrooper whose family has lost three sons in combat.

title: The Social Network
description: The story of the creation of Facebook, from its start as a university network to becoming the tech giant it is today. As Mark Zuckerberg becomes an icon, he faces legal disputes.

title: A Beautiful Mind
description: Based on the life of John Nash, a brilliant mathematician who struggles with schizophrenia while trying to achieve professional success and maintain a family.

title: The Truman Show
description: Truman Burbank, an ordinary man, discovers that his entire life has been filmed and broadcast live as a television show without his knowledge. As he realizes the truth, he fights to escape his controlled world.

title: Whiplash
description: A young drummer seeks to impress a ruthless music instructor at an elite music school. Their relationship becomes a psychological battle for artistic perfection.

title: Joker
description: Arthur Fleck, a marginalized and unhappy man, struggles to find his place in a society that rejects him. His descent into madness transforms him into the infamous villain known as the Joker.

title: Parasite
description: A poor family infiltrates the lives of a wealthy family by working in their household. As tensions rise, the situation escalates into an explosive confrontation between social classes.
During World War I, two British soldiers must deliver a crucial message to prevent a deadly attack. Throughout their mission, they face numerous dangers while fighting to survive.

title: Jojo Rabbit
description: A young boy in Nazi Germany has Adolf Hitler as his imaginary friend. His life changes when he discovers his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home, prompting him to question his beliefs and the world around him.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
description: In 1969 Los Angeles, a fading actor and his stunt double struggle to stay relevant in the film industry as Hollywood and culture rapidly change around them.

title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
description: Miles Morales, a teenager from New York, becomes the Spider-Man of his universe. Alongside other versions of the hero, he fights to stop a threat that endangers the entire multiverse.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
description: In a post-apocalyptic future, Max teams up with Furiosa, a rebellious woman fleeing a tyrannical warlord. Together, they embark on a wild desert chase to escape the oppression of a devastated world.

title: Her
description: In the near future, Theodore, a lonely man, develops a relationship with a highly advanced and emotionally intelligent operating system, challenging the conventions of human relationships.

title: La La Land
description: Mia, an aspiring actress, and Sebastian, a jazz pianist, struggle to find success and maintain their relationship amidst the challenges of life in Los Angeles. A love story filled with music and dreams.

title: Moonlight
description: The story of a young man named Chiron as he grows up in a Miami neighborhood. The film explores his identity, sexuality, and struggle to find his place in the world across three stages of his life.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: In a luxury European hotel, concierge Gustave and his young protégé Zero become embroiled in a mystery involving art theft, inheritance, and a chase. A story full of comedy and eccentric adventures.

title: Django Unchained
description: A freed slave, Django, teams up with a German bounty hunter to rescue his wife from a cruel plantation owner in the southern United States. A violent and action-packed story set in the Old West.

title: The Hateful Eight
description: A group of outlaws finds themselves trapped in a snowbound cabin during a storm. As tensions and secrets arise, mistrust turns to violence in this Western thriller.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: The 'Dude,' a laid-back man, becomes entangled in a bizarre kidnapping case after being mistaken for a wealthy Los Angeles millionaire. A cult comedy full of eccentric characters.

title: The Revenant
description: After being abandoned following a near-fatal injury, a fur trapper seeks revenge against those who betrayed him while struggling to survive the harsh, frozen wilderness.

title: Knives Out
description: When famed mystery novelist Harlan Thrombey is found dead in his mansion after his 85th birthday, Detective Benoit Blanc is called to investigate. As the mystery deepens, Blanc uncovers family secrets and lies while trying to solve the case.

title: Titanic
description: On the fateful maiden voyage of the RMS Titanic, a young, low-class artist falls in love with an aristocrat. Their love story is marked by tragedy as the ship sinks in the Atlantic Ocean.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: During World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers known as the 'Basterds' embark on a mission to assassinate Nazi officers in occupied territory. A tale of vengeance and resistance.

title: The Witch
description: In 17th century New England, a Puritan family is harassed by dark forces that threaten their unity. A psychological horror story exploring fear and paranoia.

title: Arrival
description: When an alien spacecraft arrives on Earth, a linguist is recruited to decipher their language. As time progresses, she discovers her understanding of reality and time is about to change.

title: Get Out
description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's family and begins to uncover disturbing secrets about them. What seemed like an innocent visit turns into a nightmare of psychological terror.

title: Hereditary
description: After the death of her mother, a family begins to uncover dark secrets that haunt them. As supernatural forces take hold, they must face a terrifying truth.

title: Blade Runner 2049
description: In a dystopian future, a new Blade Runner, K, uncovers a secret that could plunge the world into chaos. His investigation leads him to Rick Deckard, a former Blade Runner missing for decades.

title: A Quiet Place
description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family must live in complete silence to avoid creatures that hunt by sound. Tension and fear grow as they fight to survive in an unforgiving environment.

title: The Irishman
description: A veteran union official reflects on his life and involvement in Jimmy Hoffa's disappearance, while confronting betrayal and mortality in his twilight years. An epic portrait of the mafia and power in America.

title: Rocketman
description: The musical biography of Elton John, chronicling his rise to fame, personal struggles, and quest to find his true self. A journey filled with music, emotions, and reinvention.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
description: An epic tale about the lives of a group of Jewish immigrants in New York over several decades, from their youth to their adulthood, in the world of organized crime.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The true story of Jordan Belfort, a young stockbroker who achieves immense wealth through corruption and financial manipulation, but ultimately faces the consequences of his life of excess.

title: The Shape of Water
description: A mute woman working at a secret government laboratory forms a bond with a captive aquatic creature, while confronting intolerance and fear in an atypical, magical love story.

title: The Martian
description: An astronaut is accidentally left behind on Mars and must use all his wits and ingenuity to survive while battling time and adversity to return home.

title: The Imitation Game
description: Based on the life of Alan Turing, a brilliant mathematician who helped crack Nazi secret codes during World War II while facing persecution for his homosexuality.

title: The Favourite
description: At the court of Queen Anne of Great Britain, two cousins vie for her favor, amid personal and political intrigues. A story of power, betrayal, and dark humor.

title: Darkest Hour
description: During the early days of World War II, Winston Churchill struggles to keep Britain united while facing the threat of a Nazi invasion. A story of resilience in times of crisis.

title: The Big Short
description: In the lead-up to the 2008 global financial crisis, a group of investors discovers the housing bubble and risks betting against the financial system. A biting critique of greed and corruption.

title: Moonrise Kingdom
description: Two young runaways on a New England island embark on a summer adventure while adults try to find them. A nostalgic, visually unique fable about first love.

title: Spotlight
description: A team of investigative journalists uncovers a sexual abuse scandal in the Catholic Church in Boston. The film follows their arduous work to expose the truth and the consequences of institutional cover-ups.

title: Midsommar
description: A group of friends travels to Sweden to attend a rural festival held once every 90 years. As the celebration progresses, they discover dark secrets and macabre rituals within the community.

title: The Lobster
description: In a dystopian society, single individuals must find a partner within 45 days or be transformed into animals. A surreal comedy about love, social pressure, and imposed norms.

title: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
description: During the Cold War, a retired British spy is called back to uncover a mole within MI6 intelligence. A story filled with deception, suspicion, and unexpected twists.

title: A Ghost Story
description: After his death, a man becomes a spirit returning to his home, where his wife grieves and time passes. A reflection on life, death, and the passage of time.

title: The Florida Project
description: A six-year-old girl lives with her mother in a motel near Disney World while facing the struggles of life. A heartfelt look at poverty and childhood.

title: The Nice Guys
description: A private detective and an enforcer team up to investigate the disappearance of a young woman in 1970s Los Angeles. A mix of action, comedy, and crime with plenty of humor.

title: Annihilation
description: A military expedition explores a mysterious area where the laws of nature appear altered. A science fiction thriller that delves into fear and the unknown.

title: The Master
description: A man newly returned from World War II joins a sect led by a charismatic leader, exploring themes of power, control, and the search for identity.

title: The Handmaiden
description: In Japanese-occupied Korea, a young woman is hired as a maid for an heiress, but both have far more complicated intentions than they seem. A thriller full of twists.

title: Blade Runner
description: In a dystopian future, a police officer specializing in 'retiring' replicants, artificial beings, faces ethical and existential dilemmas while pursuing a group of these beings who have started to rebel.

title: The Hunt
description: After a tough divorce, Lucas has rebuilt his life and tries to reconnect with his teenage son. However, a comment or a fleeting lie spirals into a relentless witch hunt against him.

title: The Secret in Their Eyes
description: An Argentinian ex-prosecutor, while writing a book about his experience, revisits an unresolved case of rape and murder that deeply marked him, intertwining the past with the present.

title: The Lives of Others
description: In East Germany, a Stasi officer is assigned to spy on an artist couple. However, as he delves into their lives, he begins to question his loyalty to the regime.

title: City of God
description: In the favelas of Rio de Janeiro, two young men take opposite paths: one seeks to escape the violence, while the other delves into the world of organized crime. A story of survival.

title: Pan's Labyrinth
description: During post-Civil War Spain, a young girl discovers an underground fantasy world where she must complete three tasks to save her soul. A tale about using fantasy to escape the brutality of reality.

title: Oldboy
description: A man is kidnapped and held captive for 15 years without knowing why, only to be released and pursue revenge. A thriller with unexpected twists and constant tension.

title: A Separation
description: An Iranian couple faces their differences while fighting for custody of their daughter. At the same time, their country and its social environment play a crucial role in their separation.

title: The Intouchables
description: A wealthy quadriplegic man forms an unexpected friendship with his caregiver, a young man from a lower-class background. Together, they defy social conventions and embark on an emotionally transformative journey.

title: The Grandmaster
description: Based on the life of Ip Man, the legendary Wing Chun master and mentor to Bruce Lee, this film narrates his story of struggle, love, and honor during a time of war and social change in China.

title: The Pianist
description: The story of a Polish-Jewish pianist who struggles to survive during the Nazi occupation of Warsaw. A harrowing tale of survival, art, and human resilience.

title: Roma
description: A visually stunning portrait of the life of a domestic worker in 1970s Mexico City, navigating personal and social challenges amid political upheaval.

title: The Tale of the Princess Kaguya
description: Based on an ancient Japanese folktale, the story follows the life of a magical princess who grows rapidly and must face the demands of her royal status while seeking her destiny.

title: Let the Right One In
description: A lonely boy befriends his mysterious neighbor, who turns out to be a vampire. Together, they face violence and isolation in a unique story of love and friendship amid terror.

title: La Haine
description: After three days of riots in the Parisian suburbs, three young men confront the consequences of their actions and the social tensions surrounding them, grappling with violence and inequality.

title: Loving Vincent
description: An animated film depicting the life and mysterious death of Vincent van Gogh, using an innovative oil painting technique inspired by van Gogh's own work.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
description: Walter Mitty, an ordinary man, embarks on an unexpected adventure to recover a lost photo that will change his life forever. A story of self-discovery and bravery.

title: Children of Men
description: In a dystopian future where humanity is infertile, a man is tasked with protecting a pregnant woman whose existence could save the human race.

title: Ex Machina
description: A young programmer is selected to evaluate an advanced artificial intelligence in a remote laboratory. A psychological thriller exploring the ethics of AI.

title: The Babadook
description: A mother and her son face the presence of a terrifying entity that seems to have emerged from a children's book. A chilling psychological horror film.

title: The Invisible Man
description: A woman escapes an abusive relationship with a wealthy man, only to discover he has found a way to become invisible, haunting her life in terrifying ways.

title: The Killing of a Sacred Deer
description: A successful surgeon finds himself in a dreadful situation when a young man begins to exact revenge on him and his family in a disturbing and horrifying way.

title: Whisper of the Heart
description: A young girl embarks on a journey of self-discovery as she searches for a mysterious boy who left a series of clues about a cat and an antique ring.

title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
description: A humble boy wins a golden ticket to visit Willy Wonka's chocolate factory, where he experiences a series of surprising and magical adventures.

title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
description: During World War II, British prisoners of war are forced to build a bridge in Burma, but one man becomes obsessed with the project.

title: Moulin Rouge!
description: In bohemian Paris at the end of the 19th century, a young writer falls in love with a courtesan while struggling against the social barriers and oppression of forbidden love.

title: The Artist
description: A story about the transition from silent to sound cinema and its impact on the life of a silent film actor struggling to adapt to the changing times.

title: The Great Dictator
description: Charlie Chaplin plays both a tyrannical dictator and a Jewish barber in this political satire, using comedy to deliver a powerful critique of fascism and totalitarianism.

title: A Clockwork Orange
description: A young delinquent undergoes experimental treatment that turns him into a victim of social control. A disturbing and violent exploration of freedom and human behavior.

title: Amélie
description: Amélie, a young woman living in Paris, decides to change the lives of those around her while seeking love in her own life. A charming and visually stunning tale about human connection.
